attributes.long-description:
We are proudly presents Furmins, StarDrone Extreme and BreakQuest: Extra Evolution in a single bundle only on PlayStation®Vita:

Furmins is a unique blend of physics based set-up-and-go puzzle gameplay and real-time interactions.
StarDrone Extreme is a high-speed action thriller with a mix of arcade action, pinball, breakout, physics and collect-the-objects.
BreakQuest™: Extra Evolution – new concept interactive physics based break-out game. The energizing gameplay with a superior physics concept and advanced collision system creates never-seen-before game experience for the genre. Breaking bricks has never been so fun!

Compatible with PlayStation®Vita

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. 

©2014 Beatshapers Ltd. Developed and Published by Beatshapers Ltd. under license. ©Furmins is made by Housemarque the multiple awards winning developer of Resogun and Super Stardust HD. ©StarDrone created by Beatshapers and Orb Games Limited. BreakQuest: Extra Evolution Developed by Beatshapers Ltd, licensed by Nurium Games. All Rights Reserved.
attributes.name: 3-in-1 Mega Bundle
